description: This interface defines the board support debug information that is not used for actual control

three_phases.description: config option for three phase/single phase operation

three_phases_active.description: True if three phases is enabled for current charging session

has_ventilation.description: True if ventilated charging is allowed

pwm_running.description: True if ventilated charging is allowed

simplified_mode.description: True if car uses simplified mode of IEC61851

rcd_reclosing_allowed.description: True if RCD may reclose after fault according to local regulations

is_power_on.description: True if Relais are currently closed (power on)

cp_hi_voltage.description: Voltage of high part of PWM

cp_lo_voltage.description: Voltage of low part of PWM
